TEXTS.ITEM: U1&FUNCTIONALITY& ASIs part of connector : ZAPLINK_DOCUMENTATION ASDefine XML structure of a independent documentation & general text U1&RELATIONS& AS U1&EXAMPLE& AS U1&HINTS& AS U1&FURTHER_SOURCES_OF_INF& AS U1Memories ASThis application is dedicated to the memories of : B2My father : Lamri BENSIALI (1940-2004) without whom I never started programming B2My uncle : Jacky BEDU (1934-2009) who died during the completion of this application

LOCAL.TYPES: ` *"* USE THIS SOURCE FILE FOR ANY TYPE DECLARATIONS (CLASS *"* definitions, interfaces or data types) you need for method *"* IMPLEMENTATION OR PRIVATE METHOD'S SIGNATURE

ITEM.SOURCE:
` DATA s_text LIKE LINE OF texts. FIELD-SYMBOLS: <t> LIKE LINE OF fm_data-texts.
a0_maindata = fm_data-hdr. a0_maindata-masterlang = a0_maindata-langu. CLEAR a0_maindata-langu. LOOP AT fm_data-texts ASSIGNING <t>. CLEAR s_text. s_text-langu = <t>-tdspras. s_text-_ = <t>-_. INSERT s_text INTO TABLE texts. ENDLOOP.

` DATA s_text LIKE LINE OF fm_data-texts. FIELD-SYMBOLS: <t> LIKE LINE OF texts.
fm_data-hdr = a0_maindata. fm_data-hdr-langu = a0_maindata-masterlang. fm_data-hdr-masterlang = abap_true. LOOP AT texts ASSIGNING <t>. CLEAR s_text. s_text-tdspras = <t>-langu. s_text-_ = <t>-_. INSERT s_text INTO TABLE fm_data-texts. ENDLOOP.

TYPES.ITEM: begin of ts_text, Langu type sy-langu, _ type string, " Text end of ts_text `
tt_rawtext TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF tline WITH DEFAULT KEY `
tt_text TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF tline WITH DEFAULT KEY `
tt_texts type SORTED TABLE OF ts_text with UNIQUE key langu `
